value.content:
Public schools can work for everyone

Public education is a promise of quality of life for every kid and every community. Our teachers and principals work incredibly hard to make good on that promise. Yet they work inside of a system of laws, rules, and red tape that get in the way of keeping that promise to every kid and every family.

**As your County Superintendent, I lead with one defining priority:** **Equip the most vulnerable students — and the educators who serve them — with the tools to thrive.** Every child deserves safety, stability, and opportunity. And every educator deserves the support of a system that works. I bring the unique combination of equity-driven values, deep ed-code and school-finance expertise, and a no-nonsense approach to cutting through bureaucracy to make that happen.

value.heading: My Vision for Alameda County
value.content:
We can build a county where every child, regardless of zip code or circumstance, has a real chance at success. I work every day to:

- Innovate to break down persistent barriers that harm students
- Strengthen school systems so educators can focus on teaching
- Equip our most struggling students with the tools to thrive
- Erase the predetermination of failure for children facing violence and poverty

**This is the work — and we are making progress.**

value.heading: Why I'm Running for Re-election
value.content:
Our students can't wait for systems to someday function. They need leadership that understands the possibilities in law, the finances, the data, and the lived realities facing families — and can move all of it toward solutions.

I bring:

- Deep expertise in school finance and education code
- A record of transformative results for the students who need us most
- A collaborative, warm, community-centered leadership style
- The courage to take on broken systems — and fix them

Reelecting me means staying the course on a bold, student-first agenda that is finally moving Alameda County forward.

value.heading: What We've Accomplished Together
value.content: From stabilizing school districts to expanding services for foster and homeless youth, from modernizing operations to building innovative new programs — we've delivered real progress for students who have been underserved for far too long.

value.heading: Join Us
value.description: This campaign is about possibility, equity, and the future our children deserve. Together, we can keep building a county where every student has the tools to thrive.
